title: John Lee Hooker - The Legendary Modern Recordings 1948 - 1954 (1
description:
The reviews for this CD tell us, that it's almost impossible to collect JLH's discography, because he recorded for several labels, using different pseudonyms - but this CD is a very fine collection of his early years.
